title: Feather and the Mountain Man
description: A lonely man, a desperate woman, and a Pawnee warrior out for revenge…  Ally cannot remember her time before the Pawnee, but she knows without the raven she would die. Set free to fend for herself in the wilds along the Platte River, survival is as fragile as a feather. Daniel O’Rorke never expects to find a woman caught in his animal trap. To make matters worse, she’s with child. Daniel came this far west to avoid people and their problems. A pregnant woman with no memory is trouble aplenty, but now he owes her. When the raven brings two souls together, a Pawnee warrior with a sinister plan tears them apart. Daniel might have wanted a secluded life as a mountain man, but it will take a mountain of a man to claim an impossible future.  Heat level two flames. This novella touches upon adult subjects not suitable for young readers.  "I read this and was amazed at this author's ability to make me feel the emotions as if this journey was my own."  -Sherry Niche  "This wasn't a flowery romance. It was real, it was very real." -T.T.
author: Elle Marlow
